```{r yogurt}
setwd("C:/Users/Kathleen/Documents/udacity/R")
yogurt <- read.csv("yogurt.csv")
```


```{r pressure, echo=FALSE}
library(ggplot2)
library(gridExtra)
library(dplyr)
library(reshape2)
```



```{r}
summary(yogurt)
```

```{r}
head(yogurt)
```

```{r}
ggplot(aes(x = price), data = yogurt) + 
  geom_histogram()
```

```{r}
yogurt <- transform (yogurt, all_purchases = strawberry + blueberry + pina.colada + plain + mixed.berry)
```

```{r}
ggplot(aes(x = all_purchases), data = yogurt) + 
  geom_histogram(binwidth = 1)
```

```{r}
ggplot(aes(x = time, y = price), data = yogurt) + 
  geom_jitter(alpha = 1/4, shape = 21, fill = I('#F79420'))
```
